Reference

Query

Functions responsible for querying the database

get_acd_problem_query()

Queries "Advanced Care Directive" alert for each person

get_diagnosis_query()

Query HF diagnosis

get_discharge_referral()

Queries Discharge Letters for HF Encounters

get_disch_med_query()

Queries discharge meds

get_echos_query()

Query Echo orders

get_encounter_journey_query()

Extracts the encounters that haven't been allocated a journey id

get_hfenrolment_form_query()

Extracts enrolment forms

get_hfhomevisit_form_query()

Queries HF Homevisit form

get_hfreferral_form_query()

Extracts referral forms

get_hf_alert_query()

Queries "Known to HF service" alert for each person

get_hf_encounter_query()

Queries Encounters with HF Diagnosis

get_historical_hf_diag_query()

queries historical heart failure diagnosis

get_pathology_query()

Queries BNP orders

get_previous_encounter_query()

Order inpatient encounters by person

get_referred_to_facility_query()

Extracts referred to facility

Definition

Functions responsible for defining form names, categories etc

get_age_bin()

Define age categories

get_bnp_bin()

Define bnp categories

get_ferritin_bin()

Define ferritin categories

get_hfenrolment_form_pattern()

Define enrolment form string

get_hfhomevisit_form_pattern()

Define homevisit form string

get_lvef_bin()

Define lvef categories

Encounter

Functions responsible for manipulating encounter

mode_of_sep_groupings() enc_sep_base_patterns() enc_sep_transfer_patterns()

Rules for mode of separation

Enrolment

Functions for preprocessing HF enrolment forms

get_enrolment_fields()

Define the fields in HF enrolment form

get_n_precipitants()

Computes the number of precipiants and possible precipitants

process_hfenrolment_form()

Pivots the HF enrolment form

process_hfmanagement()

Process HF enrolment forms

summarise_enrolment()

Get most recent and first enrolment

Homevisit

Functions for preprocessing HF homevisit forms

create_visit_journey()

Extract first and last visit for each patient

create_visit_trajectory()

Process the MACARF_VISIT_TYPE field

extract_hf_symptoms()

Process HEART_FAILURE_SYMPTOMS field in Homevisit form

get_homevisit_forms()

A helper function to extract homevisit forms

process_homevisit_form()

Process homevisit forms

Inpatient

Functions for preprocessing the inpatient journey for heart failure patients

extract_age_los()

calculates age and LOS

extract_alert()

extracts advanced care directives

extract_diagnosis()

Determine diagnosis for encounter

extract_discharge_meds()

create discharge medications from encounters

extract_echos()

extracts the most recent echo order for the encounter

extract_form_result()

extracts the result and bin pathology result

extract_hfenrolment_form()

Calculates the presence of enrolment form for each encounter

extract_hfreferral_form()

Calculates the presence of referral form for each encounter

extract_patho_result()

Process HF related pathology

extract_path_result()

extracts the result and bin pathology result for a given test

get_most_recent_order()

extract the most recent event/order based on the given time column

process_inpatient()

Creates the dataframe for encounters

HFManagement

Functions for preprocessing HF homevisit forms

get_aetiology()

Processes Aetiology information in enrolment form

get_ecg_data()

Processes LVEF information in enrolment form

get_ecg_on_admit()

Processes ECG information in enrolment form

get_precipitants()

Processes Precipitant information in enrolment form

process_hfmanagement_form()

Processes HF enrolment forms

Deprecated

functions that are deprecated in favour of better functions

extract_hf_hist_diag()

extract the latest hf related icd10 diagnosis for each encounter

get_historical_hf_diag_query()

queries historical heart failure diagnosis

get_previous_encounter_query()

Order inpatient encounters by person

terminate_journeys_by()

Terminate Journeys on encounters having particular values

Defunct

functions that are fully defunct, either due to migration, or long term deprecation

Uncategorized functions

encounter_classify_separation()

Classify the Mode of Separation for Encounters

encounter_udf_add_dest()

classifies the destination given by Referred to Facility

execute_query()

Execute the query

get_first_non_na()

Get first element excluding na

hello()

Hello, World!

link_encounters_by_timestamps()

Link Encounters Into Journeys

load_data()

Load a table

load_db()

Load a table from database

process_hfreferral_form()

Create Referral form df

relink_apac_to_journeys()

Flag Journeys with the presence of APAC @ Start or end

str_to_datetime()

Convert strings column to datetime format

write_db()

Write a dataframe to a database
